entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow over northern sections. Snowfall amount 5 cm near the Nunavut border. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
